[vc_column_text]

Mega’s preferential heating system specialized in variety of thin oval & flat shape PET bottles. We provide the turn-key package for the customer’s challenging container… [More]

[vc_column_text]

The PET bottles with the handles are getting more popular in the beverage and containers for the kitchen.WASHUNprovides different solution for the PET bottles with the handle;  [More]

Wide Mouth Containers (Jar)
[vc_column_text]

At WASHUN Machinery, We offer the two stage stretch blow molding equipments for wide openings preforms. Our machine is built for the neck finishes up to 140mm  [More]

Large PET Container
[vc_column_text]

WASHUN offers the competitive large PET container production solutions. PET is free of BPA which means PET is the most safety packaging plastic materials. [More]

Loading System For No NSR
[vc_column_text]

None NSR preforms are mainly used for pharmaceutical and cosmetic containers. Due to the preform design, it caused the problems during the preform loading. [More]

Multi-layer Barrier PET Bottle
[vc_column_text]

Multi-layer barrier Bottle normally is used for the sensitive beverage industry or the pressure bottle. Due to the different layers of the preforms,  [More]
